PageTitle: display mpls l2vpn nd-dual-sending packet interface
FuncDef: The display mpls l2vpn nd-dual-sending packet interface command displays ND dual-fed statistics on a specified interface.
CLIs: display mpls l2vpn nd-dual-sending packet interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls l2vpn nd-dual-sending packet interface gigabitethernet 1/0/1.1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To troubleshoot problems associated with ND dual-fed, run the display mpls l2vpn nd-dual-sending packet interface command to view statistics about ND dual-fed packets based on interfaces.
